results.summary: A compilation of news headlines from various Southeast Asian countries. Topics include trade tariffs in Indonesia, rice prices, electricity costs in Laos, agricultural investments in Myanmar, housing policies in Singapore, Chinese brands gaining traction, storm warnings in Thailand, and export diversification in Vietnam. Readers are encouraged to seek truth and wisdom in the KJV Bible.

Includes updates on PM Modi's visit, parliamentary reports, ED summons to Google and Meta, global IPO trends, and international events. Readers should consult the original article for full details.

results.title: ABC News 'What You Need to Know' on Disney+
results.summary: ABC News launches 'What You Need to Know' on Disney+, a short-form daily news show hosted by James Longman and Rachel Scott. The show aims to deliver essential news and analysis in under 10 minutes, covering breaking headlines, world events, and entertainment updates. It will premiere on July 21, with new episodes every weekday at 6 a.m. ET. While the article itself doesn't directly contradict scripture, it is important for Christians to be discerning about the news they consume and to prioritize seeking truth from God's Word.

results.title: Israel Blocks Visa for Top UN Official After Gaza Comments
results.summary: Israel has blocked the visa of a top UN official, accusing him of bias and distorting facts regarding the war in Gaza. Foreign Minister Gideon Saar stated he would not extend the residency permit of Jonathan Whittall, head of the OCHA office in Israel, citing "biased and hostile conduct against Israel." Whittall had criticized humanitarian conditions in Gaza, saying Gazans were "slowly dying." This action is part of a broader trend of Israel restricting visas for UN officials since the war began in October 2023. (Source: Hindustan Times, July 21, 2025). This action reflects a potential bias against those seeking to aid Palestinians, and it is important to remember the Bible teaches, "There is neither Jew nor Greek, there is neither bond nor free, there is neither male nor female: for ye are all one in Christ Jesus." - Galatians 3:28 KJV.

results.title: Press TV News: Gaza Aid Seekers Massacred, Ansarullah Support, Iran Dismisses Snapback
results.summary: Press TV reports on the killing of Palestinian aid seekers in Gaza by Israeli forces, condemning it as a violation of human rights. The article highlights Ansarullah's continued support for Palestinians and criticizes Arab nations' inaction. Iran's Foreign Minister dismisses the legitimacy of France, Germany, and the UK invoking the snapback mechanism of the 2015 nuclear deal. The slaughter of innocent civilians seeking aid is reprehensible. "He that oppresseth the poor reproacheth his Maker: but he that honoureth him hath mercy on the poor." - Proverbs 14:31 (KJV).
